_header: As I me walked over fields wide / When men began to Ere
Note:
Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler TM 191; quite distinct from the other song on this theme: see 2339.
Subjects: agriculture; political verse; Church, criticism/satire of; tithes
_description: God Speed the Plough — twelve 8-line stanzas including refrain, ‘I pray to god spede wele the plough’
